    • Method Detail

      • nullOrPrimitiveDefault

        public static Object nullOrPrimitiveDefault(Class<?> type)
        Returns a value of the given type which can be used to replace null values. This is useful to provide a non-null value from generic invocations on methods which are expected to return a non-null value (typically a primitive data type). Main purpose is its use in the ControlFlowHandler (proxy), which is allowed to skip actual method execution but has to return a value that appears valid to the caller.
        Parameters:
        type - the type for which to get a null replacement
        Returns:
        null for classes, an 'empty' or zero-like value for primitive return types

      • wrapWithControlFlowHandler

        public static <T,U extends T> T wrapWithControlFlowHandler(U object,
                                                           Class<T> interfaceType,
                                                           ComponentId<? extends AludraService> serviceId,
                                                           SystemConnector systemConnector,
                                                           AludraContext context)
        Wraps the given object with a dynamic proxy that implements a parent interface of the object and transparently add control flow logic using the ControlFlowHandler.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the interface to return
        U - the type of the object to be wrapped
        Parameters:
        object - the object to be wrapped
        interfaceType - the type of the interface to create and return
        serviceId - the service ID of the object
        systemConnector - a SystemConnector for accessing the state of the object
        context - the AludraContext
        Returns:
        an object that implements the specified interfaceType and wraps calls with the ControlFlowHandler

      • wrapWithInvocationHandler

        public static <T> T wrapWithInvocationHandler(Class<T> interfaceType,
                                              InvocationHandler invocationHandler)
        Calls the Java dynamic proxy API to dynamically implement the given interfaceType using the given invocationHandler.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of interface to be implemented
        Parameters:
        interfaceType - the type of interface to create
        invocationHandler - the InvocationHandler to apply to calls of the created object
        Returns:
        an object that implements the specified interface and processes calls with the specified InvocationHandler
        See Also:
        InvocationHandler

      • getStackTraceElement

        public static StackTraceElement getStackTraceElement(int levelsUp)
        Returns a specific the stack trace element of the current invocation stack.
        Parameters:
        levelsUp - the number of levels to move up in the stack trace
        Returns:
        the StackTraceElement #levelsUp before the current one

      • getTestStatus

        public static TestStatus getTestStatus(Throwable t)
        Provides the test status for a given exception.
        Parameters:
        t - the exception to map to a status
        Returns:
        the test status for a given exception
